Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.university.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents the player in the game. The player can move between rooms, interact with items, and be affected by traps and other conditions like sleep or being trapped.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(Integer powerPoints, String name)
    Constructs a player with the specified amount of power points The player starts with an empty inventory and is neither trapped nor asleep

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(Integer powerPoints, String name)
      Constructs a player with the specified amount of power points The player starts with an empty inventory and is neither trapped nor asleep
      Parameters:
      powerPoints - The initial number of power points for the player

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(Direction direction)
      Moves the player in the specified direction if the player is not trapped or asleep If the destination room contains a trap, the trap is activated
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction in which to move the player

    • lookAround

      public void lookAround()
      Allows the player to look around the current room and see the items and adjacent rooms Describes the room and any items or chests present

    • getCurrentRoom

      public Room getCurrentRoom()
      Returns the current room the player is in
      Returns:
      The current room of the player

    • setCurrentRoom

      public void setCurrentRoom(Room currentRoom)
      Sets the player's current room
      Parameters:
      currentRoom - The room to set as the player's current room

    • getInventoryManager

      public InventoryManager getInventoryManager()
      Returns the player's inventory manager, which is responsible for handling the player's items
      Returns:
      The inventory manager of the player

    • getPowerPoints

      public int getPowerPoints()
      Returns the player's current power points
      Returns:
      The player's current power points

    • addPowerPoints

      public void addPowerPoints(int powerPoints)
      Adds the specified number of power points to the player
      Parameters:
      powerPoints - The number of power points to add

    • removePowerPoints

      public void removePowerPoints(int powerPoints)
      Removes the specified number of power points from the player
      Parameters:
      powerPoints - The number of power points to remove

    • isTrapped

      public boolean isTrapped()
      Checks if the player is trapped
      Returns:
      true if the player is trapped, false otherwise

    • setTrapped

      public void setTrapped(boolean isTrapped)
      Sets the player's trapped status
      Parameters:
      isTrapped - true if the player is trapped, false otherwise
